This is, however, a kind of teaching for which most of us have not been trained, and that faculty and students approach with some trepidation.Â In this article, we explore the use of science fiction as a tool to enable those teaching artificial intelligence to engage students and practitioners about the scope and implications of current and future work in computer science.
